name: Toaster Simulator 2021: Electric Boogaloo
description:
The official sequel to Toaster Simulator 2020 with all new features!

It's got the colored toasters, it's got the strategy. What more is there to want in a game?

Controls

  • Press R to reset once the toast has shot out.
  • Press S while toasting to shoot toast further

<3

Thanks to Google Poly for the models (toast, toaster, trees, house, shrubs, grass)

Thanks to CC0textures for the textures.
